products.title: Fellow Opus® Conical Burr Grinder
products.body_html:
• 41+ precision settings with intuitive grind guide
  • Anti-static technology
  • C6-40 Burly Burrs™: 6-blade 40 mm conical burrs
  • 6 Nm of torque
  • 350 RPM burr speed
  • Timed autostop
  • Magnetic catch cup
  • Low grind retention
  • 110 gram capacity
  • Single dose loading for maximum freshness
  • Spouted catch for easy transitions
  • Compact height and footprint

products.title: Fellow Ode® Brew Grinder Gen. 2
products.body_html:
• New best-in-class Gen 2 Brew Burrs
  • New anti-static technology for less grind mess
  • New 100 gram capacity
  • New load bin design for smoother bean feeding
  • 31 grind settings and guide
  • Quiet grinding and automatic stop
  • Single dose loading for maximum freshness
  • Low grind retention
  • Magnetically aligned catch with easy pour fins
  • Grinds knocker

products.title: Fellow Aiden® Precision Coffee Maker
products.body_html:
Fellow Aiden® Precision Coffee Maker

Details:

Filters: Includes 15 cone filters and 15 flat bottom filters 

Fits Melitta #2 cone filters and Melitta 8-12 cup basket filters

Dimensions (LxWxH):  8 15/16 x 8 15/16 x 12 inches | 227 x 227 x 304.8 millimeters

Weight:  9.6 lbs

Max Capacity: 1.5 L

Cord Length: 39 inches | 965.2 mm

Power: 110-120V | 1700W | 60Hz

App: Available now — Connect to the Aiden app for shareable brew profiles, automatically synced Fellow Drops profiles, and to keep your device updated for the best performance.

products.title: heart travel cup
products.body_html:
This ceramic-coated vessel features a convenient flip-top lid for effortless sipping while maintaining a secure, leak-proof seal. 12oz. By created. 

  • Created with 18/8 stainless steel, a double-walled design, and vacuum insulation because we’re good at keeping hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold.

  • 100% Leak Proof

  • Ceramic Coated Interior

  • Color-matched Interior/Exterior

  • Globally-minded and BPA Free

  • Do not microwave or freeze 

  • Should be washed by hand to maintain integrity of product

products.title: Cupping Spoon
products.body_html:
A durable, rust-resistant spoon designed for precise coffee tasting. Its deep bowl and ergonomic handle make it perfect for professional cupping sessions or everyday use.
  • Made from food-grade stainless steel
  • Lightweight, durable, and rust-resistant
  • Ergonomic handle for a comfortable grip

products.title: Sunny Heart-Cat Sweatshirt
products.body_html:
Design by Drew Steadham, creative artist, dear friend & someone who used to work with us at the roastery. We’re honored to showcase his thoughtful art again!

  • Gildan® Heavy Blend™ 8 oz/yd² | 60% Polyester / 40% US Cotton
  • Machine wash with like colors, tumble dry low

products.title: Martina Thornhill Ceramics - Ear Mug
products.body_html:
We’re thrilled to collaborate with local ceramic artist & friend, Martina Thornhill.

Martina has created these beautiful, handmade cups exclusively for us, so we can share them with you!

  • Slipcast body, hand built handle
  • Stoneware mug in ‘soot’ glaze
  • Holds 8 oz
  • This item is hand made using food safe clays and glazes. There will be subtle variations in size, glaze markings & finish.
  • Dishwasher safe
  • price is for one mug

products.title: Martina Thornhill Ceramics - Espresso Set
products.body_html:
We’re thrilled to collaborate with local ceramic artist & friend, Martina Thornhill.

Martina has created these beautiful, handmade cups exclusively for us, so we can share them with you!

  • Slab and pinch built from white stoneware in green crackle glaze

  • Mug measures 2.25”tall x 3” wide (4” wide including handle). Holds approximately 3 oz. Saucer measures 3.25” diameter, 3/4” tall.

  • Price is for one cup + saucer.

  • This item is hand made using food safe clays and glazes. There will be subtle variations in size, markings and finish, dishwasher safe

products.title: NextLevel Pulsar Brewer
products.body_html:
The Pulsar brewer is a collaboration between NextLevel & Jonathan Gagné.

Prior to the release of this 0 bypass brewer, we got our hands on a few prototypes that our QC team has been brewing with since April. 

Finally, the latest version is available for sale!

We would go as far as to say that these brewers are on our top heart picks for manual brewing. They are highly recommended by all of us at heart, most specifically, the QC team. 

The Pulsar brewer comes with 100 paper filters.

featured_image.alt: nextlevel pulsar brewer. black. pictured with a turquoise background.

products.title: Aeropress Coffee Maker
products.body_html: Aeropress coffee brewing kit, including aeropress chamber, plunger, filter holder, filter cap, stir stick, scoop, and funnel.

products.title: Heart x Coal beanie
products.body_html:
Our friends at Coalheadwear giving us some color choices to keep our heads warm!

Available in grey, red, red marl and black.

The beanies are a shallow fit, with our classic heart woven label. These can be cuffed or worn relaxed.

featured_image.alt: black heart beanie hat with small white tag with heart logo. styled on a glass head against a white backdrop.
grey coal heart beanie hat with small white tag with heart logo. styled on a glass head against a white backdrop.
red heart beanie hat with small white tag with heart logo. styled on a glass head against a white backdrop.

products.title: Roasters Choice Subscription
products.body_html:
You’ll experience a diverse selection of coffees sourced from around the globe, including smaller lots that may not be featured on our menu!

Our coffee subscription is a perennial favorite, making it the perfect gift for any coffee enthusiast or someone just starting to explore the world of heart coffee.

The curated coffee subscription is chosen by the roasters.

Choosing a 2 bag option will give you 2 different coffee offerings with each shipment.

With a rotation every two weeks, you’ll enjoy a fresh & exciting coffee experience with each delivery. 

Use code "subscribeandsave" for free ground shipping with your first subscription delivery.

Manage your subscription
